title: Results of French Revolution in Americas

content.question: Which of the following developments in the Western Hemisphere most directly resulted from the French Revolution?

choices.label: The expansion of the slave trade in the Americas
The extension of the plantation economy in the Caribbean
The creation of the first independent Black republic in the Americas

content.answer: The creation of the first independent Black republic in the Americas

topic.text: 5.2: Nationalism and Revolutions in the Period from 1750 to 1900

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
